basic_info.description: I'm Erich Hartnauer. I am a Full-Stack developer who thoroughly enjoys making new and exciting practical applications. I am new to the tech field and looking to learn and grow with a company to sharpen my skills.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: One of my projects at Code Fellows. I built an application that took in information from multiple store locations and would total up sales per hour as well as daily totals. It would then total up the sales from all the locations. You can add new locations if needed. Everything is rendered dynamically to the DOM with JavaScript.

projects.title: Odyssey
projects.description: This was another one of my projects at Code Fellows. This was a team effort. We created a quiz application to raise awareness to areas that were heavily impacted economically as a result of the pandemic. The idea was to find areas that were not as well-known but offer similar experiences to more popular locations.

projects.title: New Project Coming Soon
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
